title: recently played
body: am i missing something because my recently played "tab" does not update after my ranked games

replies.body: Do you mean recently played summoners, or your match history?  Do you have a screenshot handy just to help me understand what's going on?  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uXAseEIG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-02T20:46:31.121+0000)
>
> Do you mean recently played summoners, or your match history?  Do you have a screenshot handy just to help me understand what's going on?  Let me know!

hmm i am a bit late on this lol sorry. im specifically talking about the recently played summoners pull down that is under the friends list. it usually only shows me people i play with on every other type of game except ranked.
he means in the client on the right the tab in the friends list labeled recently played. Mine is not updating either.
